meanings.sent1: The plant's autotoxic leaves caused harm to its own roots.
meanings.sent2: It is important to avoid using autotoxic chemicals in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy scientist accidentally created an autotoxic potion that made him sick.
meanings.sent4: Her negative thoughts had an autotoxic effect on her mental health.
meanings.sent5: The snake's venom had an autotoxic impact on its own body.

meanings.definition: The state of being toxic to oneself.
meanings.sent1: Autotoxicity can occur when the body's immune system attacks its own cells.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the concept of autotoxic to the patient.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the idea of autotoxicity, making the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the character struggled with autotoxicity due to self-destructive behaviors.
meanings.sent5: The researcher studied the effects of autotoxicity on the body's organs.
